trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Azione trigger che fornisce la funzionalità per eseguire la ricerca (ignorando) fino a un momento specificato all'interno del periodo attivo di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard> azione con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> per cercare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che le operazioni di ricerca non accettano lo storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> in considerazione le impostazioni: lo storyboard viene trattato come se avesse un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> 1 e n <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Ricerca un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> trigger relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> eventi.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Sospendere, riprendere, arrestare o controllare in modo interattivo uno Storyboard

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> impostato in modo interattivo, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> proprietà di relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) di controllo da riferimento relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore di spostamento in avanti o indietro dello storyboard rispetto all'origine della ricerca <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" />.

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore positivo o negativo che specifica il valore di spostamento in avanti o indietro dello storyboard rispetto all'origine della ricerca <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che le operazioni di ricerca non accettano lo storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> in considerazione le impostazioni: lo storyboard viene trattato come se avesse un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> 1 e n <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*oggetto* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>= "[-] [*giorni*.] *ore*:*minuti*:*secondi*[.* frazioni di secondo*] "/ >

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*oggetto* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>= "[-] [*giorni*.] *ore*:*minuti*"/ >

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- oppure -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-]*days*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset%2A>="[-]*days*"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: Items in square brackets (`[` and `]`) are optional.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi tra parentesi quadre (`[` e `]`) sono facoltativi.

trans-unit.source: *days*
trans-unit.target: *Giorni*

trans-unit.source: A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: Un valore maggiore o uguale a 0, che descrive il numero di giorni fa riferimento l'offset.

trans-unit.source: *hours*
trans-unit.target: *Ore*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: Un valore compreso tra 0 e 23 che rappresenta il numero di ore fa riferimento l'offset.

trans-unit.source: *minutes*
trans-unit.target: *minuti*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: Un valore compreso tra 0 e 59 che rappresenta il numero di minuti fa riferimento l'offset.

trans-unit.source: *seconds*
trans-unit.target: *Secondi*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this offset.
trans-unit.target: Un valore compreso tra 0 e 59 che rappresenta il numero di secondi di cui fa riferimento l'offset.

trans-unit.source: *fractionalSeconds*
trans-unit.target: *fractionalSeconds*

trans-unit.source: A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: Un valore composto da 1 a 7 cifre che rappresenta i secondi frazionari.

trans-unit.source: For the complete <xref:System.TimeSpan> syntax, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%2A> page.
trans-unit.target: Per l'intero <xref:System.TimeSpan> sintassi, vedere la sezione Note del <xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%2A> pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione a partire dalla quale viene applicato l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> di questa operazione di ricerca.

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Posizione a partire dalla quale viene applicato l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> di questa operazione di ricerca.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin.BeginTime" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> property of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> deve essere serializzata.

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> property of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard" /> deve essere serializzata; in caso contrario, **false**.
